commit message:
Code is in a working state, all open networks will be forgotten on
disconnection once the application has been installed
Settings coming later
Start implementing interface - enable checkbox functions

Implement notification checkbox
Rename methods in Settings.java

Started implementing whitelist control
Stored network id is reset if connecting to any network

Added license
Included omitted files from res/

Mostly implemented whitelist, although SSID cannot be specified (random number is added)
Interface fixes
Changed minimum version to Honeycomb due to use of get/putStringSet()
Added UiGoodies class with useful methods (eg. displaying toasts)
Added input dialog to take a network SSID and add it to the whitelist
Display toast if no SSIDs are selected when attempting to remove one

Hopefully fixed buggy whitelist
Cleanup code in MainInterface.updateUI()
Redorder if condition logic to be more efficient in WifiConnectionHandler.detectAppropriateNetwork()

Added comments to MainInterface.java
Added license header to UiGoodies.java

Implemented Android backup service, settings now backed up
Cleaned up Strings.xml
Fixed bug where the no SSID selected toast wouldn't appear after an item had been checked
Re-add support for Android 2.2 & 2.3 (albeit with whitelist functionality currently disabled)
Fix incorrect conditional!

Added about screen
Added subclass of TextView, ArrayTextView. Overloads setText() to allow easy populating using a String array
Merge branch 'implement_about_screen'
Improve setText methods in ArrayTextView

Final 0.1 stable release - as published to the Play store! :)
Added icons

Switched to version 0.1.1
Fixed application title
Increased padding in UI
Hide settings when disabled

Fixed checkbox text padding on 2.x devices
Code cleanup

Version 0.1.1 as released on the Play Store
Further cleanup
Introduced public attributes in Settings to represent true/false

Updated version code to 2
Actual 0.1.1 release to Play Store :)
Start switching to new storage system that is compatible with Android 2.x
Updated version
Implemented migration to new storage system for Android 3.0+ devices that previously used the whitelist feature
Minor interface updates

Correctly use key parameter in new list set and get methods
Add ERROR constant

Further corrections to list set and get methods in Settings:
Length of list is now correctly stored for passed key.
Remove unnecessary loop count variable

Fixed bug where trying to remove anything but the first SSID in the whitelist would fail on the first try
Better logic in MainInterface.whitelistRemoveHandler()
Reduce overhead by not using a list iterator in list set method in Settings
Remove debug logging
Fixed bug where application would crash on attempting to remove the last SSID from the whitelist
Move back to the old implementation of whitelistRemoveHandler() so that it works correctly when no items are checked!
Version 0.1.2 as released on the Play store
Removed duplicate condition checking
Default to enabled and display notifications if there are no values stored (ie. enabled immediately after install)
Increment version

Added an informative message that is shown when the whitelist is empty
Cleanup
Rename some interface ids for consistency

Interface refinements
Added useful debugging method getAllReadable() to Settings
Slight interface refinement (lighter text for empty whitelist message)

Shorter and nicer user visible application name
More informative empty whitelist message
Added missing layout file (about_interface.xml) so project should now build
Merge branch 'master' into 0.1.3

Actually display notifications by default
Slight interface refinements
Externalise strings in WifiConnectionHandler
Nicer dividers in whitelist
Added README
Updated README
Added license detail to README
Version 0.1.3 as released on the Play store

Add menu item to clear all open networks (not functional yet)
Increase version

Start moving to menu items for managing whitelist
Currently duplicated with existing buttons
Added menu item icons (Action Bar Icon Pack from developer.android.com) missing from previous commit
Removed old buttons for managing whitelist
Added light icons that will be used in future

Implemented whitelist clear function
Code cleanup

Sort icons correctly for 2.2
Reduce duplicate icons

Start getting ready to extract re-usable code for other applications
Move re-usable code to new package
Add settings functionality to seperate package to allow easy extraction in future
Action bar/menu now only show actionable items
Removed no ssid selected warning as it is no longer required (remove sequence can no longer be invoked without a selection)
Cleaned up interface both internally and externally
Modify application name when in development to x-dev
Added icon for about menu item
Slight string/notification alterations
Cleanup source formatting
Update version name again to x-dev-y
Updated version
Fix bug #2

Merge branch '0.1.3.1' into 0.1.4
